Package com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon

Interface Summary
IBeaconConsumer An interface for an Android Activity or Service that wants to interact with iBeacons.
IBeaconData  
IBeaconDataNotifier  
MonitorNotifier This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon monitoring notifications
RangeNotifier This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon ranging notifications
 

Class Summary
IBeacon The IBeacon class represents a single hardware iBeacon detected by an Android device.
IBeaconIntentProcessor  
IBeaconManager An class used to set up interaction with iBeacons from an Activity or Service.
Region This class represents a criteria of fields used to match iBeacons.
 

Exception Summary
BleNotAvailableException Indicates that low energy bluetooth is not available on this device
